title: mA pati
sahitya:
mA pati nAmamu maruvakE manasA marivErE cintalu mAnavE manasA


anupallavi



caraNam 1    samsAra saukhyamu satamani nammi capalada bondaku viphalamu summi
    caraNam 2    tanuvu astiramani dalacaka nIvu manasija janakuni maraciyunnAvu
    caraNam 3    dAra putralu taNDri talli tanavAru taranipoyyE vELa tanaveNTa rAru
    caraNam 4    paralOka sukhamula bAguga dalaci paramAtmutagu hari pAdamu golici
    caraNam 5    vara nara janmamu vaccEdiyarudu para gati bondEdi bAgaina birudu
    caraNam 6    pAmara janula sambhASaNa bAsi pApa vidhAriNi para stuti jEsi
    caraNam 7    dEhamu sthiramani teliyaka nIvu mOha sAgaramuna munigiyunnAvu
    caraNam 8    parama bhakta gOpAladAsuni pAlincEvADani bhAvinci madini
